messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Oprah
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/27/02 9:18:10 AM Central Standard Time, ... I m glad it was mentioned here! I never watch Oprah or other talk shows! Darin was shocked to
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/27/02 9:18:10 AM Central Standard Time,
Tuckervill@... writes:


> > I saw her!
> >
>
> Yeah, me too! And it was a very nice piece!
>
> Tuck
>

I'm glad it was mentioned here! I never watch Oprah or other talk shows!
Darin was shocked to come home to see me on the couch watching! (a commercial
was on and he asked me if a special ER or Law and Order was on. <g>) I
thought Mary and her girls were beautiful! What pretty hair they all have. A
lovely family and home!

~Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Oprah
messages.msgSnippet: I forgot. Darn it. Marty wheeled me over to Hollywood Video about 3:00, and then everyone else left (Keith to take Kirby to karate and Holly to a birthday
messages.messageBody:
I forgot.

Darn it.

Marty wheeled me over to Hollywood Video about 3:00, and then everyone else
left (Keith to take Kirby to karate and Holly to a birthday party in another
town, and In the quiet that ensued I just threw in a movie and worked on
Thinking Sticks I've owed for weeks.

I feel like a dope! It was at 4:00, and I had total peace and could've
watched it, no problem.

I need a secretary.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Oprah

messages.messageBody:

Tuck

messages.subject: Oprah
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/27/02 5:58:02 AM Central Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/27/02 5:58:02 AM Central Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Mary said they might only be in the front row. Any updates now that it's
been taped? >>

I saw her!
They ran the two minute segment of Mary in her home with her three dd's (ds
didn't want to be on tv, so he avoided the cameras). They called her a "stay
at home mother of four" but didn't mention homeschooling at all.
A very beautiful family! I was surprised that Tara had image hang ups, being
so pretty and all...but then it's never about how one really looks. It's
those dang messages in our heads eh?

Ren
"The answers aren't important really...
What's important, is knowing all the questions."
-Zilpha Keatley Snyder
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
